reviews.review: Interesting, for someone who doesn't follow super heroe movies it will be really hard to keep up. Still, really entertaining.
The Russo Brothers created a magnificent piece. Every character from Groot to Shuri played a vital role in making this possible. The surprises were too great. I can't wait for the untitled sequel.

Great film. I wondered how the Directors were going to give all the main characters screen time, though I think they pulled it off. Great character development, the film was also funny as well as completely entertaining with an ending that leaves you wanting more. Thanos is the best villain I've seen in a movie yet armed with a realistic agenda for his mayhem.
It was really good. The Russo brothers are very good at keeping all together. Did not go all non-coherent Michael Bay Transformery crazy that i feared it might.

I loved this movie. Some parts were exciting, some parts were tense, some parts were funny and some parts were heartbreaking. It was an action packed movie that hit the ground running and never stopped until the breathtaking ending. As a Marvel Cinematic Universe fan, I had no trouble following all of the characters and enjoyed seeing them all on screen playing their part. It was pointed out to me by lesser fans that they found the array of characters dizzying and overwhelming. I still think that this movie was a lot of fun and I highly recommend it!

I love this movie it's surprise mas and make me sad becand use all the heroes lose and died well half of them into dust I glad the fourth one coming out next year so I can wait to see the better ending.
It was really good worth watching the movie. But there is still too many questions unanswered. One of the best movie. Can‚Äôt wait till the Avengers 4 to come out. üëçüèº

It's the emotion and heartfelt acting that truly gives such an ambitious movie like this its soul and elevates it to something special.  This is one I'm definitely going to have to watch several more times.
Loved this movie, i absolutly love a good bad guy story, and this was it! Great story action and humor. Probably the best comic book based movie of all time. Highly recomended.
Love this movie! I even jumped once or twice and I don‚Äôt do that! Kept me on the edge of my seat!
